author: ate
msg: Fix for JS2-735: Jetty-6 ConcurrentModificationException on logout
This change allows disabling forcing session invalidation from our own SessionsManager for Jetty.
As Jetty on logout/invalidation of a session already invalidates *all* sessions, including when redeploying a web application (sic), we don't need to enforce this ourselves then.

author: thilina
msg: uncommenting the work around for Axis2-2626 as it's not being fixed as mentioned...

author: imario
msg: VFS-164: move the WebdavConnectionManager to the now renamed ThreadLocalHttpConnectionManager and use it in webdav and http to workaround the standard way of connection handling of the used HttpClient library which tries to limit the number of connections to 2 per server and in the end drives VFS in a deadlock situation under heavy load.
